metadata.name: For Trees Club & Treegens
metadata.description: Planted 2M mangrove trees across the coast of Kenya & Tanzania

metadata.name: Treegens &                        For Trees Club
metadata.description: We have planted over 2M mangrove trees across the coast of Kenya & Tanzania

data.title: Trees did not survive
data.description:
After physically visiting Kirepwe Creek, I could NOT see any of the Mangroove trees (estimated age/size 3 years based on planting timeline) at most of the locations indicated in the video links.

It is very likely that the trees did not survive due to poor planting techniques and improper choice of locations. Aditionally, some of the report planting densities did not make sense due to the physical constraints of the landscape.
